solution_line_template: Bert was able to earn {bert_phones_sold} x ${bert_phone_price} = $<<{bert_phones_sold}*{bert_phone_price}={bert_earnings}>>{bert_earnings} for the toy phones.
While Tory was able to earn {tory_guns_sold} x ${tory_gun_price} = $<<{tory_guns_sold}*{tory_gun_price}={tory_earnings}>>{tory_earnings} for the toy guns.
Therefore, Bert was able to earn ${bert_earnings} – ${tory_earnings} = $<<{bert_earnings}-{tory_earnings}={bert_more_than_tory}>>{bert_more_than_tory} more than Tory.
